name: Rex Ponce (Rex)
biography: I'm Rex, a Saiyan warrior raised on Earth! Launched to Earth as a baby, I hit my head and forgot my mission to conquer the planet. Raised by a kind old man, I grew up with a pure heart and a love for martial arts. My adventures take me across galaxies, facing powerful villains, training relentlessly, and pushing my limits to become the strongest fighter ever. Along the way, I make incredible friends, protect my loved ones, and fight for the sake of Earth!
motto: Never give up! Train harder and keep pushing your limits!
